extendedInfo.description: The pinacle of 2D action-shooting is coming back on Android!Make your way through multiple battelfields and put an end to the Rebel Army Leader General Morden's evil plans!!Features list:âNot only a perfect port of the original NEOGEO game!  In addition to its classic âARCADE MODEâ, this perfect conversion of âMETAL SLUGâ includes a âMISSION MODEâ, allowing you to select in which stage you want to play!You can now train yourself in your favorite stages or those which give you a hard time! â Receive items from rescued POWs!You can received several items by rescuing fellow POWs during missions!These items provide upgrades for your powerful weapons! POWs can also be found in secret places....â Make good use of the multipurpose tank: the METAL SLUG! Aside from the Vulcan and Cannon attacks,you can also evade enemies' attacks by squatting and even jumping!As a last resort you can ram your slug into the enemy troops!Create a huge explosion by self-desctructing your slug using the "METAL SLUG ATTACK" unleashing extreme damage to your enemies.â A control scheme allowing for precise controls!The "Autofire" feature allows you to fire your weapons continuously by holding down the button, you can reposition the buttons outside of the game screen area in "Window mode".Enjoy every corner of METAL SLUG using your own custom controls!âIntense cooperative gameplay via the Bluetooth function!  "METAL SLUGâ can be doubly enjoyed by playing with another brother-in-arms simultaneously via the Bluetooth function! Will you be able to clear the hardest stages with your friends?

reviews.title: Excellent but issue for 1080p phones!!
reviews.comment: Before I upgraded to my S4 from my old S2 I played this game for hours on end! But now I can not play due to the oversized buttons that can not be downsized!! Please fix this issue so I can start playing again!!!
reviews.author: Timothy W

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: Very fun epic game! The game runs smoothly and the controllers make it easy to navigate!
reviews.author: Carlos Rivera

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4 GPe
reviews.comment: Buttons are way too big to play on 1080p phones.  This is one of my favorite games.  Please fix a.s.a.p.
reviews.author: Jeremy Maxwell

reviews.title: BIG buttons lol
reviews.comment: Great game, runs well on my Galaxy Note 10.1 (tablet) but there is an issue with the button size on my HTC One, they are bigger than the buttons on my tablet lol, makes this game totally unplayable. I imagine this fault is in all the metal slugs and all 1080 phones such as the S4 and HTC One so beware if u r buying.
reviews.author: John McNichol

reviews.title: wow
reviews.comment: Don\'t buy if you have a 1080p phone, you won\'t be able to play any android metal slug game. I was smart enough to buy all the metal slug games, before trying out at least one. The buttons are way to big and take up more than half of the screen, and there\'s no way to resize the buttons trust me i checked. Fix this issue please. It\'s totally unplayable, if anyone is aware of a fix for this please message me. Overall i\'m very disappointed, anyone know how i can get a refund for all the metal slug games i bought???
reviews.author: Alex Gonzales

reviews.title: Button issue on S4
reviews.comment: This is a great game but the size of the buttons are way too big and takes a lot away from it. If the issue is fixed then will rate four and a half stars but as it stands it\'s only worth 3. Please fix and will give it a higher rating.
reviews.author: Cem Yaman

reviews.title: NEEDS 1080P UPDATE!!
reviews.comment: Great game but not playable on 1080p phones. Please fix.
reviews.author: Chris Bates

reviews.title: As much as I would love to give the game 5 stars...
reviews.comment: I just can\'t right now. I am in love with the Metal Slug games. But I have a few gripes with this game. First and most important, I\'m running this on a Nexus 4, and I feel there really shouldn\'t be any slowdown. Yeah the arcade games did have some slowdown, and I\'m okay with that but this is not on the same level with some  stutters on occasion too. Also, I know I\'m playing on a touch screen so I can forgive the not so precise controls, but I\'m really hoping an update to be able to use a controller to play.
reviews.author: Alexander Rosa

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: Than their metal slug 3 port. They left out the gree thing which was a great idea since that service never worked very well. The game runs fairly smoothly on my phone, the hardest part is getting used to the soft buttons.   I wish they would release an updated version of their metal slug 3 app and took out gree and gave you more coins.
reviews.author: Trenton Garcia

reviews.title: Great Classic but has compatibility issues
reviews.comment: Great Classic but has compatibility issues. Works great on my Moto XOOM tablet... but I\'m having issues on my Huawei Ascend Mate... Sloppy sound and music...
reviews.author: Abdalkarem Al Abawi

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.comment: Would be perfect all round if the movement controls were better. Does a great job of bringing a classic to life.
reviews.author: Michael Howell

reviews.title: Yayy!!!
reviews.comment: Best game  ever!! Wait til\' everyone plays tha other ones?!?! Excellent game you guys!!!
reviews.author: mark balvuena

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Bad. Can\'t even play one level without it shutting down. Waste of money !
reviews.author: Christian Castille

reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
reviews.comment: I used to play this gorgeous and challenging game since my childhood. Great port.
reviews.author: Eleaor F.

reviews.title: Nice porting, hard to play
reviews.comment: Nice game, well ported. But it is very difficult and not so pleasant to play with the display controls.
reviews.author: stefano pellegrini

reviews.title: Works great on my gs3
reviews.comment: Keep these games coming to Android well done guys brings back my younger days playing these games fof hours.
reviews.author: Gavin lee

reviews.title: Classic game
reviews.comment: Multiple video modes, can change button location. V.Happy :)
reviews.author: Richard Harvey

reviews.title: Great port of a classic game
reviews.comment: Had some initial issues but they\'ve been fixed. I\'ve seen Metal Slug bring some home consoles to their knees, but it runs very smoothly here. Great port of a classic game.
reviews.author: Herman Rethuan

reviews.title: Needs an update
reviews.comment: Please update your games so it\'s usable for the galaxy s4
reviews.author: Kaal Chhoung

reviews.title: Neo geo pocket
reviews.comment: Never got to own a neogeo back in the day. Awesome playing games from that machine on something that fits in a pocket
reviews.author: chris pinkston
